channel.title: PI make it show points price instead of coins price in a pk point shop

item.title: PI make it show points price instead of coins price in a pk point shop
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

ShopAssistant.java

Replace your buyFromShopPrice method with this:

public void buyFromShopPrice(int removeId, int removeSlot){ int ShopValue = (int)Math.floor(getItemShopValue(removeId, 0, removeSlot)); ShopValue *= 1.15; String ShopAdd = ""; if (c.myShopId == CUSTOM_SHOP_ID) { c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs " + getPKValue(removeId) + " points."); return; } if (ShopValue >= 1000 && ShopValue < 1000000) { ShopAdd = " (" + (ShopValue / 1000) + "K)"; } else if (ShopValue >= 1000000) { ShopAdd = " (" + (ShopValue / 1000000) + " million)"; } c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" coins"+ShopAdd); }

Replace the “getPKValue” method with whatever you use to find your points. An example would be:

public int getPKValue(int item) {
		switch(item) {
			case 10551:
				return 800;
			case 6585:
				return 1200;
			default:
				return 0;
		}
	}

Read full topic
